properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 6 at 3:11PM EST until January 8 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Gale Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through
late Tuesday night.

* WINDS...West 20 to 30 knots with gale force gusts to 35 knots
Tuesday afternoon, veering northwest through late Tuesday
night.

* WAVES...4 to 7 feet Tuesday afternoon, occasionally to 9 feet.
Waves 6 to 10 feet, occasionally to 13 feet Tuesday night.
properties.instruction:
A Gale Watch is issued when the risk of gale force winds of 34 to
47 knots has significantly increased...but the specific timing
and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to provide
additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT
